\begin{axis}[
    width=8cm, height=5cm,
    xlabel={energy},
    ylabel={Density},
    title={Layer 19: $d=-2.82$, $p_{MW} < 10^{-61}$, $p_{t} < 10^{-100}$},
    grid=major,
    grid style={dashed, gray!30},
    legend pos=north east,
    area style,
]

% Valid Distribution
\addplot [name path=valid, draw=blue, thick, fill=blue!20, fill opacity=0.5] table [x=x, y=y_valid] {\mydistdata};
\addlegendentry{Valid ($N=194$)}

% Invalid Distribution
\addplot [name path=invalid, draw=red, thick, fill=red!20, fill opacity=0.5] table [x=x, y=y_invalid] {\mydistdata};
\addlegendentry{Invalid ($N=260$)}

% Vertical Mean Lines (Optional)
\draw [blue, dashed, thick] (axis cs:1742981.6733247424,0) -- (axis cs:1742981.6733247424,\pgfkeysvalueof{/pgfplots/ymax});
\draw [red, dashed, thick] (axis cs:1945173.5173076922,0) -- (axis cs:1945173.5173076922,\pgfkeysvalueof{/pgfplots/ymax});

\end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}
